articles.title: Gallery
articles.description: Clicking on a thumbnail opens a viewer with viewing options and links to the code used to create the chart and the article or project that it's associated with.

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Indiana COVID-19 Tracker


This website tracks metrics that include disease spread, hospital resources, social distancing, and age demographics






{indianacovid19data}


A R package for access to most of the processed and raw datasets from the Indiana COVID-19 Tracker project






{ebtools}


A personal R package of miscellaneous data science functions






Reds JAWS


A Shiny dashboard for evaluating Reds Hall of Fame candidates.
